title: All-inclusive luxury: dream holidays for two with Sandals
text: Discover more about Sandals luxury holidays » As pioneers of the Luxury Included ® concept for couples, Sandals helps you book your dream holiday, secure in the knowledge that the magical experience begins from the moment you set off to a paradise destination. Tropical beach frontage, romantic hideaway accommodation, swim-up bars, butler service, gourmet dining, rum punch galore, a private plunge pool and tranquil spa... you don’t have to seek out luxury in a Sandals Resort. It lies in wait for you to savour. And with an unparalleled array of inclusions covering five-star amenities, premium-brand drinks and thrilling personal touches, you never have to worry about additional costs or spiralling budgets. Everything is taken care of – even tips and taxes - leaving you to focus on enjoying your stay, which is why Sandals has been voted the World’s Leading All-Inclusive Resort for the past 19 years. Chairman Gordon ‘Butch’ Stewart is passionate about sharing the relaxed island life he enjoyed growing up in the Caribbean. “At Sandals, we give our guests more quality inclusions than any other resorts on the planet,” he says. “It’s our hallmark, to exceed guest expectations... anytime, anywhere.” The chairman’s trusted local knowledge ensures each water-edge resort throughout Jamaica, Barbados, Antigua, St Lucia, Grenada and the Bahamas enjoys perfect sand, calm waters protected by coral reefs and a leeward location where gentle sea breezes offer respite from the sunshine. Beyond unscripted days and sensual nights, what are the impressive Luxury Included ® features that make Sandals visitors return again and again, or choose Sandals for a customised wedding and honeymoon? Everything is taken care of – even tips and taxes – leaving you to focus on enjoying your stay Unique styles of accommodation have infinite appeal. There are up to 26 categories to choose from per resort from Love Nest Dream Suites and thatched Rondoval villas to Millionaire Suites with private balcony infinity pools and swim-up lagoon rooms. Each is designed in keeping with island character and to maximise the view over tropical garden, sand and sea. Top-tier suites come with the services of your own affable butler, trained by the Guild of Professional English Butlers. It’s up to you what you want to eat, when, and in what ambience. Internationally trained chefs serve gourmet cuisine – Japanese sushi and teppanyaki, French, Italian, Tex-Mex, Thai, Mediterranean, New York steakhouse, Caribbean, British pub fare, Indian, seaside grills, hot dogs and pizza. Options range from sand-between-the-toes snacks to elegant candlelit dining served with Robert Mondavi wines; entertainments include beach barbecues, cocktail parties and poolside dances. Sandals bar staff love practising their cocktail-making skills. It is the generosity of inclusions that makes aficionados of first-time visitors. Endless water sports are available, including water-skiing, paddle-boarding and the Caribbean’s most comprehensive scuba-diving opportunities. The Red Lane ® Fitness Centre satisfies gym junkies while facilities for tennis, beach volleyball and unlimited rounds of golf encourage you to indulge in a favourite pastime or try something new. From waking daily to the sound of lapping water or sipping cocktails by beach fire pits under the stars, Sandals delivers on undiluted romance and serenity. • For more information on Caribbean holidays, visit sandals.co.uk
